items.title: If You See This Message, Your Amazon Account Is Under Attack
items.summary: A new attack targeting Amazon accounts has increased by 5000% in just 2 weeks, putting users at risk. It is important for Amazon users to be aware of this threat and take necessary precautions to safeguard their accounts.

items.title: Open Deep Research Agent : Unlocks the Future of AI Research
items.summary: Open Deep Research Agent aims to revolutionize AI research by providing a precise and adaptable tool to redefine the approach to complex investigations.

items.title: New York State $400 Inflation Refund Checks: How and when to get refunds? Here’s who is eligible and what is required to get checks
items.summary: New York State residents will receive inflation refund checks of up to $400 to offset sales tax increases caused by inflation, starting mid-October 2025. Eligibility is based on 2023 tax filings, affecting over 8 million people.

items.title: Dog Owner Checks Doorbell Camera at 3am, Unprepared for What She Sees
items.summary: Aileigh checked her door camera at 3am and was surprised to see her dog sitting outside, with the voice on the camera being AI-generated. Inconsistencies in AI-generated content may lead to unexpected or unusual situations.

items.title: Storks deliver an angel on AI Express Muscat-Mumbai flight

items.title: Elon Musk Is Reviving Vine—With a Twist
items.summary: Elon Musk is reviving Vine, the video-sharing social media app, with a twist that includes AI-generated voice. The app, known for its short video clips, will be brought back after being shut down in 2017.

items.title: Tech industry layoffs hit 100,000 for 2025 — Intel leading the pack with over 12,000 personnel cut, so far
items.summary: Tech industry layoffs have reached 100,000 for 2025, with Intel leading the pack by cutting over 12,000 positions. Microsoft and Meta have also reduced their workforce by 10,000 and 8,000 people respectively.

items.summary: A passenger on a Delta flight was pleasantly surprised to find out that their seat neighbor was a golden retriever, due to an AI-generated voice assigning seats. This unconventional seatmate experience highlights the use of AI in passenger seating and interactions.
